title: How do I reduce my mobile data usage?
answer:
- Turn off the mobile network when you do not need it.

- Disable the data service if your phone is connected to a Wi-Fi network.

- Access Wireless Access Protocol (WAP) sites instead of World Wide Web (WWW) websites.

- Turn off the mobile network by deselecting Data enabled under Settings > Mobile networks.

- Turn off data synchronization by turning off Accounts & sync for an existing account under Settings > Account.
